description: This is a React component 'GameSelection.jsx' responsible for rendering a game selection page. It displays a greeting with the username, navigation buttons for different games, and a logout button. The component uses props for user interaction handlers.

methods.description: React functional component that renders the game selection page, including greeting, game buttons, and logout button.
